title: Web Development
metaDescr: Example of a Web Development dashboard.
descr: Manage the project tasks, open the website mockups, edit the website code, start the dev server, build a production version, access the project files, backup the project.

title: Project Management
metaDescr: Example of a Project Management dashboard.
descr: Manage the project tasks and communicate with the team.

title: Writing Blog Post
metaDescr: Example of a Writing Blog Post dashboard.
descr: Write a plan, write a post, easily find synonyms.

title: UI Design
metaDescr: Example of a UI Design dashboard.
descr: Open ui specs, open a style guide, open wireframes, edit ui, see the storyboard and the ux mind map.

title: Creating Contract & Invoices
metaDescr: Example of a Creating Contract & Invoices dashboard.
descr: Create a new contract and auto send invoices.

title: Trading
descr: Analyze markets, get latest news, trade, write notes.
